titleStmt.title: [To them that before this image of pity devoutly say v. pater noster, v. aves & a credo piteously.]
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church. aut

notesStmt.note: Xylographic, with 28 compartments, the text cut out.--STC.
Identified as STC 14072 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect: stained, illegible; consists of frontispiece only.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
